entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [WebDeploy] WDP fails to sync when package comes from a DevDrive #40562
  • Not able to install MAUI on ArchLinux system #40576
  • Security risk in Docker image: CVE-2023-45853, CVE-2023-50387, CVE-2024-0553 #40558
  • Error text is the wrong color when stdout is redirected #40547

Closed

  • I was struggling with omnisharp not resolving the dotnet-sdk snap on 20.04 until I discovered that a simple #40068
  • [NETSDKE2E][Regression]With 6.0.422 SDK installed, .Net Host will stop working when creating F# mvc/webapi project. #40503

PullRequests

Created

  • Temporarily disable the publish of the installer manifest #40580
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Have --no-restore imply -restore:false to override any response file command-line arguments #40579
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Add test #40548
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix and update vmr-sync scripts #40583
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add nativeToolsOnMachine flag #40572
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Mention package references from dotnet list help at the top level #40317
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Reduced frequency of GitHub stale action; add action write permissions #40533
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Clean up PR artifacts publishing #40486
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Source-build fixes and clean-up #40559
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Don't fail log publishing when test results folder doesn't exist #40557
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove duplicated Version file entries #40546
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow

Updated

  • Aspire #40111
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
